svelte.BasicVariables:
<script>
	let count = 0;

	function handleClick() {
		count += 1;
	}
</script>

<button on:click={handleClick}>
	Count: {count}
</button>
svelte.ConditionalRendering:
{#if x > 10}

{x} is greater than 10

{:else if 5 > x}

{x} is less than 5

{:else}

{x} is between 5 and 10

{/if}
svelte.DependentVariables:
{count} * 2 = {doubled}

{doubled} * 2 = {quadrupled}
